main event: On 30 August 1961, a yellow-white point of light was observed moving in a straight flight overhead in Fairborn, Ohio, based on both visual and radar detection.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 1.5 minutes,The object was tracked both visually and on radar,The operator stated that it had characteristics similar to a satellite,There were no conflicting reports or other aircraft in the area at the time,The sighting occurred at an altitude of approximately 1000 feet with the object flashing bright before becoming a steady glow.
